title: AlbertRioja
author: AlbertRioja
content: Good morning, afternoon or evening everyone. I have a website about cryptocurrencies which is this: https://cryptodev.tech/ and I would like how I could monetize it. adsense? Affiliates? Thanks in advance

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Bitcointalk used to sell ad space. If your site ever gets to the point where other people would be glad to pay to have their ads and banners displayed there, you could make money from that. Maybe you can write paid reviews or some similar sponsored articles.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: I'd go with affiliate programs[1] for this type of site. I can see that you have a few guides about where to buy crypto, how to start, etc. You can use your own links when redirecting people to exchanges. [1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5276902.0

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: Quote from: AlbertRioja on October 17, 2022, 10:53:48 AMGood morning, afternoon or evening everyone. I have a website about cryptocurrencies which is this: https://cryptodev.tech/ and I would like how I could monetize it. adsense? Affiliates? Thanks in advanceyou can become an affiliate and get a banner for you to put on your website or you can also become a publisher paid for bitcoin, you can find that information in the search for a lot of publisher websites that are paid with bitcoin payments

comments.author: BlockChainMentor
comments.body: Both .. You can do affiliate and adsense both

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I can't read the content of your articles due to language barrier, but based on the image you're mostly explain about altcoins which is would be easy for you to get money. Haven't you offer to all altcoins project if you're writing a review about the project and you will get a share from it? only get a share of top 10 coins, not from their coins because it mostly a shitcoin.I'd say you should keep improving your writing skills and learn about SEO rank, this will make other projects want to put a paid banner on your sites.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: If you can present web statistics well, try offering a press release service to a new project and including it in the headlines section for up to a few weeks.I believe there are some companies or projects that are actually also interested in advertising on low visitor sites of say up to 200 visitors per day, especially sites with local languages that can reach a more regionally specific audience.To be able to truly enjoy the earnings, you must accept exchangeable crypto and upfront payments.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: The best way to monetize a website is through affiliate marketing and selling services to your visitors. Once they have been convinced that you know what you're talking about, they will be more than happy to pay you for the advice you have given them. The key here is to provide quality content that people appreciate, and then offer them something. It's not about selling products or services as much as it is about providing value. This is a slow process though, so start building your reputation by giving the best content possible and never selling out your product's morals or ethics. Cryptocurrency is becoming a major industry, and it's still in the relatively early stages. It will continue to grow, and there are plenty of opportunities to make money as a result.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Affiliate programs, as OSS suggested, seems like your best option and the most suited for your website and the type of content you provide.I would avoid ads as many people find them annoying and probably won't stay too long on your website and never visit it again. You should also avoid Google ads as they have a very strict policies and too many restrictions when it comes to crypto ads.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Your website is just 49 days old https://whois.domaintools.com/cryptodev.tech you are still not recognized on the internet.I suggest you first make an effort to promote the site and set up SEO as much as you can. build any metrics about your site, only after that, you can think about monetization.You already got the answer, probably the best combination you can do is Adsense + affiliate and maybe can try direct sales of advertising space. we are back to the beginning again, most ad services will ask that you have much more traffic in order to accept you at all. and the earnings themselves will be insignificant with only a few random visits to your site.Quote from: khaled0111 on October 17, 2022, 06:44:06 PMYou should also avoid Google ads as they have a very strict policies and too many restrictions when it comes to crypto ads. you thought something here. he wants to place an advertisement on the site, not advertise himself and his crypto business. all these "strict" google rules refer to the advertising of crypto products and not to advertising on a crypto website.For example, I have approved an Adsense account and I can place their banners even on the faucet page (tested a few days ago) and they will be approved instantly.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: AlbertRioja on October 17, 2022, 10:53:48 AMGood morning, afternoon or evening everyone. I have a website about cryptocurrencies which is this: https://cryptodev.tech/ and I would like how I could monetize it. adsense? Affiliates? Thanks in advanceQuote from: examplens on October 17, 2022, 08:09:42 PMYour website is just 49 days oldThere are a lot of similar websites right now..  until you are recognized it will take some time.INstead of Google ads you can try cointrafic and similar ones  that pay in crypto for crypto websites.You can also wait until your website has some reputation and get some sponsors.  You can even try in the services board in bitcointalk. Bur you need some solid traffic.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.created_time: October 18, 2022, 03:03:18 AMLast edit: October 18, 2022, 03:18:08 AM by Little Mouse
comments.body: How much daily visitors do you have? I haven't checked anything but with low number of visitors, it's very much unlikely that you will get a good revenue from any methods you use. However, from my personal experience, I would recommend you to affiliate for an exchange which can be a good one in future. I have tried Binance and Kucoin for a long time but got no good return. Got 1 sign up only.Besides run adsense though it won't get you a good revenue unless you have a huge visitors though CPC depends on country base. In my case, I barely got $0.03 even lol.You can also reach out to new crypto start up for a custom deal like selling a banner space. This is one of the best methods I think as the success rate could be higher if you can present professionally.Quote from: Marvelman on October 17, 2022, 03:24:09 PMThe best way to monetize a website is through affiliate marketing and selling services to your visitors.As easy as it sounds, maybe as hard as it is. It's not that easy to sell services. I have been trying to sell one for the last year, I wasn't able to get one single deal lol. Maybe I'm doing things wrong but still, it's hard. You also should know that OPs site is in local language.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Depending on your number of visitors, you could take advantage of AdSense, which you could use to show ads and get paid for them. Having affiliates is also an excellent thing to utilize on websites knowing that it could potentially give you income if they sign up. I think that's a great way to monetize it for sure. Maybe you could add a shop in your site in order to get an immediate revenue if that could be a thing with you.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: AlbertRioja on October 17, 2022, 10:53:48 AMGood morning, afternoon or evening everyone. I have a website about cryptocurrencies which is this: https://cryptodev.tech/ and I would like how I could monetize it. adsense? Affiliates? Thanks in advanceIt depends on your traffic if you have a good flow of traffic offering ad space is profitable but if you are just building up your traffic then affiliate marketing and Adsense will work fine with your website, but even Adsense and affiliates are looking for sites with good traffic so it's better that before you look for monetizing your website be sure you have a good rank in the search engine and traffic flow is continuous.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Though it's given above the big list of affiliate programs that might you can try and here's an article (How to Monetize Your Cryptocurrency WordPress Site) that might also enlighten you and give a better idea.AdSense sometimes is very strict and we know how sensitive they're when it comes to crypto.Just make sure that you've read this AdSense Online Terms of Service to avoid mistakes in the future that you don't know. You can do both and even here in the forum you can advertise your website as suggested above.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Nothing beats affiliate and CPA when it comes to monetizing a website, CPA offers a big percentage per lead or sales, and you need traffic or subscribers to maximize your profit, I think you will be better doing Affiliate and CPA because your location is very much suited to CPA.It's too early for you to monetize your website, you have to be 60 to 90 days old for you to get accepted on CPA and Adsense, increase your traffic and backlinks first before monetizing your website.Domain:cryptodev.techRegistrar:Hosting Concepts B.V. d/b/a Registrar.euRegistered On:2022-08-29Expires On:2023-08-29Updated On:2022-08-29

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Without content and continuous traffic, you will not continue to make profits from your site, so focus on the content and then, without even having marketing plans, you will find a lot of money.At the moment, you will need some marketing managers and they will succeed in making you earn a little money if there are visits to your site.at the current state your website if far from approved by google or make profits.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: If you want to work on larger number of visits i suggest to at least change your language to english as default language and have an option to choose for your local language so many will understand to your content. Build your social media presence since i cant see any on the site.Plus this below.Quote from: BitMaxz on October 18, 2022, 10:52:04 PM T&C, privacy policy, about, contact us and cookie policy Dont be impatient, building seo, domain/page authority doesn't change overnight. So read what are the essentials on how your site/pages will rank up in the google search page.
